QuestData.Title: The Earth Rises
QuestData.Description: The effects of the Twilight's Hammer attack can be felt even here, this close to the world tree.$B$BAs our forests burn, the very earth turns against us in a crazed frenzy.$B$BWe can't allow the elementals to go unchecked. Go and help our men take care of them.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $n. Your fighting prowess is admirable. You will be crucial to putting a halt to the elemental onslaught.
